description.english: Bring a little color to the world
Bring a quirky glow to the world
Give the world a healthy splash of color.
Spread color across the lands.
Bring color to half of the world.
Make the world a truly beautiful place.
Collect a precious, delicious gem.
Suck the earth dry of gems.
Unearth a single, ancient Relic.
Uncover every mysterious Relic.
Stumble upon a diary entry.
Piece together the entire diary. Feel a little dirty.
Begin your journey to trivial wealth.
Hoard an outrageous fortune. Sigh.
Meet a few stars
Meet many stars

displayName.english: In actuality, Star is a metaphor

description.english: Meet a lot of stars
Meet innumerable stars
Meet so many stars, you will become numb.
Meet a galaxy of stars.

displayName.english: But who are we to judge? You've seen the universe.

description.english: Meet a universe of stars.

displayName.english: The last twist of the knife.

description.english: Reunite the Ancient Cube with the Ancient Star
Find the Ancient Star.

displayName.english: To call them baby steps would be insulting to babies.

description.english: Leave home.
Experiment with a few colors.
Meet a Cube.
Encounter a Stalker.

displayName.english: Who are you to pass commandments?

description.english: Inspire a Stalker.
Inspire ten Stalkers.
Unearth a history of the Tiny Things
Uncover all Tiny Things histories.
Decrypt the Tiny Things language.
Resurrect the Tiny Things
Create a sustainable Tiny Thing population

displayName.english: You've lost control of the situation

description.english: Deafen the world with the sound of Tiny Things
Murder a Tiny Thing
Become the reaper of the Tiny Things
Flood the world with the deathly ink of Tiny Things
Bring inky blackness to the world
Paint the world with darkness
Sweeten the pot with pink
Sink the world into pink
Enflame the passions of the world
Convert the world into a red mess
Inject a jittery uncertainty into the world

displayName.english: I just don't know what I'm doing, anymore

description.english: Make the world question its purpose
Sprinkle a modest joy over the world

displayName.english: Joy... means different thing to different people

description.english: Rain joy down upon the world

displayName.english: Fertility can be both a blessing and a curse

description.english: Make the world swell with fertility

displayName.english: When I think fertile, I think bloated

description.english: Make a swollen and fertile world
Imbue the world with an optimistic outlook
Twist the world into optimistic denial
Crush the world under pensive agony
Bend the world to silent reflection

displayName.english: See the task, do the task

description.english: Introduce utility, pride, purple
Twist the world beneath flamboyant pragmatism
Spread mud, earth and primal urges
Trigger the rise of the primal geometry
Dry the world, spread dust and deadly warmth
Create a dusty utopia.

displayName.english: White is hard to keep clean

description.english: Spread the white menace
Burn the eyes of unbelievers with white glory.
Sink the world into strange, rich nausea
Soak the world in oil and bile.
Raise a luminous Dome
Pierce the ground with a Jut
Become the savior of the spores: Raise a Mushroom.
Celebrate stern design by raising a Pagoda

displayName.english: I'll call you Pharaoh if you'll call me Sir

description.english: Invoke the anguish of a thousand souls and raise a Pyramid.
Raise a Brutal Pyramid with your ominous tones

displayName.english: The Flanges make it a party

description.english: Raise a Flanged Pyramid
Move straight, move bold - raise a Rook
Settle in muck. Raise a Shack
Joy in bulk: Raise a Skyscraper
Raise the ominous shadow of life; raise a Tombstone
Raise a Tower and acknowledge that glory is unattainable

displayName.english: The countryside is a grim place indeed

description.english: Create a pastural mise en scene - raise a Windmill
Raise a Windtrap - the color must flow

displayName.english: Feel free to believe in the Skunk Ape, but...

displayName.english: If your life is a circle - the radius is this achievement
